channel.title: Making this give me an item [PI]
channel.description: [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/33wxu05.png[/img] So I'm rewriting my Crafting class and when I click on the let's say "vambs" button it exes out of the interface but it doesn't give me an item. How can I make it give me an item? Thanks.

item.title: Making this give me an item [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Vhenom Vhenom
item.description:
@Vhenom wrote:

So I added this

case 34185: c.getItems().addItem(558,600); break;

And it does work but I want it to only work for the green d hide, but this does it for red blue and black. Anyway I can fix that?

Read full topic
item.source: Making this give me an item [PI]

item.title: Making this give me an item [PI]
item.dc:creator: @asshole_rule asshole_rule
item.description:
@asshole_rule wrote:

You just add it under the switch statement that buttons are handled with

item.title: Making this give me an item [PI]
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

A clicking button ID should print out in the command prompt, if it doesn’t then it’s already being handled.
